resource.description: OAuth2 value expected by Azure AD when issuing tokens.  It affects the 'audience' in the issued access_token.

secret.description: OAuth2 secret.  Instead of setting the secret in the Terraform file, using the CURL_CLIENT_SECRET environment variable is advised.

tenant_id.description: OAuth2 value expected by Azure AD when issuing tokens.

http_method.description: HTTP method like GET, POST, PUT, DELETE, PATCH.

response.description: Valued returned by the HTTP request.

uri.description: URI of resource you'd like to retrieve via HTTP(s).
